title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The problem is that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the first operation, an illegal state is created.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the settings menu.
3. Set the output location and classpath as one operation.
4. Press Ok.
5. Observe that the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src' is not displayed.
